ISSUE.TITLE: Redundant "Help <" suggestion in search autocomplete (admin area)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to admin area 2. Try typing "hel" or "la" 3. You'll see a redundant "Help <" suggestion ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5019111/109257949-553d0300-780a-11eb-8dc9-2eb7a7dce28b.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5469 Added some model validation on the methods in the SettingController

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5467 Fixed problem with searching on the main menu in the admin area
